about_the_game:
Welcome to the galaxy Foodomina! Made of food planets and advanced Foodian civilizations…

In this fantasy sci-fi RPG, you play as cosmos travelers, friends, heroes, partners, Takoyaki and Tempura.

Battle against an Ancient Enemy of the Foodians... MOLD! As their once dormant enemy returns, seeking to rule the Planets of Foodomina and spread their Infection across the Galaxy…

The implications of being a hero is tough… you must eradicate this invasive species before it takes more! But these Moldians use to be Foodians… maybe there’s another way?

✦ Discovery & Exploration✦

Foodomina is a character-rich story, layered with constant discovery! Explore Foodian societies across the galaxy, rich in culture and flavour! Meet other Foodians who will assist you on your journey… in their own way.

Whether it be the cities and kingdoms of Foodian Cuisines, the personable characters… or the volatile mold species… you’ll be sure to discover a lot about Foodomina’s mysteries, secrets, and the unique, complex perspectives of all the intricate Foodians and Moldians in it!

✦ Turn Based Combat with Food Puns ✦

Engage in sci-fi turn-based combat against elusive Mold Enemies! All they want is to infect, spread, and grow! You HAVE to get rid of them… but maybe killing isn’t the answer? Maybe… the answer is… Food Puns? In a unique Battle Mechanic?

✦ Bullet-Hell Gameplay ✦

The Mold won’t go down without a fight though, and when its their turn, you’ll have to do your best to dodge Moldy spore attacks! Featuring bullet-hell gameplay, you can protect yourself during attack sequences and avoid getting infected yourself by shooting DEFENSIVE BULLETS! They have stunning properties against spore attacks!

✦ OTHER FEATURES: ✦

  • Original and whimsy Pixel Art & Animations with tons of seasoning! ✧˖°.

  • Original hybridized modern 8-bit soundtrack rich in flavor! ✧˖°.

  • Wait… sometimes the FOODIANS battle you?!

  • Witness un-imaginable eldritch horrors and question if God is real

  • Live with the realization that the fate and existence of an entire intelligent and autonomous humanoid species has been left entirely in the hands of you… playing as recently promoted food girls- blissfully unaware of the inevitable devastation to come and that no matter the choice, no ending is perfect!

✦DEMO COMING SOON✦

If any of this makes you hungry for more, we have a STEAM DEMO coming soon which will include:

Story Mode: Roughly 30 minutes of gameplay, our Story Preview is a condensed version of the game's beginning, where you can explore the main gameplay features we have to offer! Great for people interested in getting to know the characters, exploring some environments, Foodomina's lore, and cutscenes!

Battle Mode: If Story Mode doesn't satisfy your Turn Based Combat & Bullet Hell cravings, and you can endure the Food Puns... then BATTLE MODE is for you! Featuring 10 diverse Mold Battles, including a Final Boss, experience back to back battles with increasing challenge, against enemies with personalities that'll grow on you... like mold!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 (2 * 2930), AMD Phenom 9650 Quad-Core (4 * 2300), or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB) or Radeon HD 7750 (1024MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 (2 * 2930), AMD Phenom 9650 Quad-Core (4 * 2300), or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB) or Radeon HD 7750 (1024MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In the Galaxy Foodomina... Play as two cute Food Girls! And fight... MOLD?! In space! Explore Foodian Planets & make friends to save the universe from Mold Infection! But the Mold People... use to be Food People! Maybe there's another way... and maybe that way is... Food Puns?
